sentences.english: It is worth noting that the report also found the American border to be atr isk.
sentences.chinese: 值得注意的是，報告同時發現，美國邊界亦岌岌可危。

sentences.english: America's machine-tool industry was on the ropes.
sentences.chinese: 美國的機牀工業是岌岌可危了。

sentences.english: But even then, she cautions that you're walking a precarious line.
sentences.chinese: 即使如此，她也顧慮你走在一條岌岌可危的路上。

sentences.english: As a weak country surrounded by powerful neighbors, North Korea's external position looks dire.
sentences.chinese: 身處強鄰圍繞之中，朝鮮的國外形勢似乎岌岌可危。

sentences.english: But now those plans appear to be in peril.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在，這些計劃似乎都岌岌可危。

sentences.english: As China modernizes, many traditional beliefs become endangered.
sentences.chinese: 隨着中國的現代化發展，許多傳統信仰變得岌岌可危。

sentences.english: Looking up at his nose, I saw snot dripping.
sentences.chinese: 我擡頭看着他的鼻子，發現有塊鼻屎岌岌可危。

sentences.english: But organic food is so popular that its value system is in  jeopardy.
sentences.chinese: 但是有機食品很受歡迎，它的價值體系也岌岌可危。
